name: yag-env
description: Prepares the data defined via 'process.env' to be used in web applications or node packages

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run dist:data && npm run tsc
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir esm
scripts.dist:data: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp LICENSE.txt dist/
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:es5 && npm run tsc:es6
